medevac_hospital_germany:
%base_info% In this mission you will provide cross-border HEMS assistance performing a patient transfer between two hospitals designated on your GPS.
Details on the location will be provided at mission start. Usage of a helicopter is mandatory.
Hints: - Land on the designated hospital helipad. - Shut down engines - Observe status messages and follow instructions if requested. - Wait for signal to take off. - Start engines and proceed to next GPS waypoint.
